title: macky
introduction: Macky.ai is a comprehensive AI-powered consulting platform designed to assist various business functions including HR, Operations, Strategy & Research, Customer Experience, Sales & Marketing, Productivity, Image creation, Finance, and IT. It offers instant responses and advanced integration capabilities.
features: Up to 10,000 consulting queries per month
Dedicated account manager and priority support 24/7 via email, live chat, and phone
Advanced integration with 3rd party platforms and APIs
targetPeople: Businesses and professionals seeking AI-powered consulting solutions
